title: Skeleton
description: A skeleton definition for joints and skins.

root.description: The root joint of the skeleton.

joints.description: Indices of skeleton nodes, which are joints.
joints.gltf_detailedDescription: Indices of skeleton nodes. The nodes form a complete subtree in the scene graph.

inverseBindMatrices.description: The index of the accessor containing the floating-point 4x4 inverse-bind matrices.  The default is that each matrix is a 4x4 identity matrix, which implies that inverse-bind matrices were pre-applied.
inverseBindMatrices.gltf_detailedDescription: The inverse bind matrices representing the skeletons default bind pose
